name: Moon Rabbit
description: Inherits **12%** of the Wanderer's flame, ice, volt and physical ATK. Moon Rabbit has **1** module spot and **5** skill points.
advancements: Increase attack inheritance to **18%**, increase Moon Rabbit Burst damage to **244%** of ATK, Moon Rabbit now has **2** module spots and **8** skill points.
Increase attack inheritance to **24%**, increase Moon Rabbit Shot damage to **573%** of ATK, increase ATK boost to **120%** of ATK, Moon Rabbit now has **3** module spots and **11** skill points.
Increase attack inheritance to **30%**, increase Daihatsu Thunder damage to **522%** of ATK, Moon Rabbit now has **4** module spots and **15** skill points.

abilities.name: Moon Rabbit Burst
abilities.effect: Moon Rabit starts rotating and rushes forward, carrying thunder with him. The electric arms deal volt damage 6 times, each strike dealing damage equal to **163%** of ATK.

abilities.name: Moon Rabbit Shot
abilities.effect: Moon Rabbit shoots a large amount of volt energy to enemies in front, causing 3 lightning strikes. Each strike deals damage equal to **382%** of ATK, and give the Wanderer an ATK boost of **60%** of ATK.

abilities.name: Daihatsu Thunder
abilities.effect: Moon Rabbit drops mines around his body to attack surrounding enemies, causing 6 lightning strikes, each dealing damage equal to **348%** of ATK.
